attributes.title: I HATE IT HERE
attributes.review: I was so inspired by this app that I ate 50 oranges and my mom was possessed by Donald trump 😳DONT download this app if you want clear skin

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: terrible! doesn’t work and glitches and gives me useless information i don’t care about!

attributes.title: yikes.
attributes.review: the second i opened the app, an fbi agent broke into my house and continued to punch my grandma, drop kick my little sister, and curb stomp my dog. he said it was by the orders of donald jenius trump. this was very unpleasant, 1/5 stars, would not recommend.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: this was terrifying being on this app. the layout made no sense and there was no actual information.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I tried to open it didn’t load. Also a lousy president! App promotes hate👎🏽 TRASH DELETE THIS APP NOW

attributes.title: Scary
attributes.review: It gave me 20 viruses and my phone kept alerting me I was being tracked.

attributes.title: 🤮terrible
attributes.review: Opened the app.... deleted it immediately 🤢🤢

attributes.title: EWWWWW👁👄👁✌️🌈✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: i’m scarred for life you open the app and a scary pedo is staring at me, i felt very unsafe and scared. i want my mommy to come pick me up, TAKE THIS APP DOWN IT SCARES THE KIDS

attributes.title: Trump

attributes.title: Ǥᖇᗝᔕᔕ
